reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 222/97: DESIGNATION - BROWNING-FERRIS INDUSTRIES LIMITED
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 222/97: DESIGNATION - BROWNING-FERRIS INDUSTRIES LIMITED
reg_info.act_under: Environmental Assessment Act   Loi sur les évaluations environnementales

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “Browning-Ferris Industries Limited” includes any person related to Browning-Ferris Industries Limited by ownership and any person, other than a municipality, who is a party to a contract with Browning-Ferris Industries Limited respecting any undertaking described in section 2. O. Reg. 222/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“Browning-Ferris Industries Limited” includes any person related to Browning-Ferris Industries Limited by ownership and any person, other than a municipality, who is a party to a contract with Browning-Ferris Industries Limited respecting any undertaking described in section 2. O. Reg. 222/97, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Any enterprise or activity by Browning-Ferris Industries Limited of disposing of waste at the Ridge Landfill, located on Parts of Lots 13 to 16, Concession 4, Township of Harwich in the County of Kent, pursuant to a provisional certificate of approval for a waste disposal site issued after the day this Regulation comes into force under Part V of the Environmental Protection Act, is defined as a major commercial or business enterprise or activity and is designated as an undertaking to which the Environmental Assessment Act applies. O. Reg. 222/97, s. 2.
